name: Luca Moroni
subtitle: CFO at A2A
about: Large experience (20+) in Finance in multinational and international environment, in different Industries (Food, Chemical/Pharmaceutical, Consumer goods, Servicies). Finance experience have been integrated with GM responsibilities, in particular, in HR, IT, Legal. BoD experience.Creating value for shareholders is my primary professional goal. Leading complexity and motivating people to perform at their best.Determination to pursue goals always challenging the confort zone.
experiences:
Managing NFP through the implementation of a Financial Planning system, able to set specific goals to strategic units in order to maximize operative cash flows.
Managing debt maturities exploiting all different opportunities on DCM and Equity Linked market (convertible). Liability Management projects done.
Building up a new function: Credit Management, by setting up a new organization, new procedures and systems to manage the three big processes in CM: Origination, Monitoring and Recovery.
Group planning and control reorganization: from a reporting function to an analytical one, closer to businesses.
Fast closing project implemented to shorten Financial statement scheduling.
After the acquisition of Saeco Group by Royal Philips NV I move from my CFO position to the Post Merger Integration (PMI) Project.

Group C.F.O.: my responsibility foresees, other than Finance and Controlling (plus Legal and Tax), HR and Information Technology. 
Saeco is managed by an Executive Committee composed by CEO, CFO (myself), Sales & Marketing Director, Industrial Director e R&D Director.  
Executive Committee main tasks: group re-organization towards a managerial company; development and launch of a new products range, with high standard of technologies; processes innovation/standardisation and Brand Equity improvement. 
Personal Main goals reached: Cash maximisation through a strict control of NWC; Performance Management analysis through the implementation of a controlling department; re-organization of treasury dept. through the implementation of a centralised cash pooling system; debt refinancing; SAP system roll out; HR performance analysis tools; trade unions managements; subsidiaries process reorganization; plant delocalization management; Minority shareholders’ management.

I re-engineered the Planning process (3 years Plan) introducing value analysis per Product/Market, with the goal to prune products bringing negative value. 
I implemented a severe control on purchasing and manufacturing costs.

Oggi è il mio ultimo giorno di lavoro come CFO presso il Gruppo Hera, dopo 12 anni vissuti intensamente. Tantissime le sfide, le soddisfazioni e i traguardi raggiunti grazie ad un team di collaboratori di grande professionalità, che ringrazio di cuore per avermi accompagnato in questi anni, facendomi crescere professionalmente. Ringrazio il Presidente Tomaso Tommasi di Vignano e l’Amministratore Delegato Stefano Venier, con il quale ho lavorato per tanti anni a stretto contatto, fino al suo nuovo prestigioso incarico presso Snam. Ringrazio tutti i componenti del Management Team con i quali abbiamo condiviso progetti importanti e sfidato limiti verso la ricerca continua dell’eccellenza. Ringrazio il nuovo Amministratore Delegato Orazio Iacono che ha compreso il mio desiderio di ricercare nuove sfide professionali: una nuova avventura inizierà domani. hashtag#team hashtag#eccellenza hashtag#sfide hashtag#traguardi hashtag#professionalitàTomorrow my last day as CFO in Hera, after thoroughly immersing myself in the Company over the past 12 years. Many challenges, great satisfactions and huge target reached, thanks to a great professional team of colleagues which allow me to grow. I thank them so much. I am grateful to the President, Mr Tomaso Tommasi di Vignano and the CEO Stefano Venier, whom I worked with until his new prestigious assignment as Snam CEO. I thank Management Team Directors whom I shared great projects with and always looked for excellence. Finally I would like to thank the new CEO Orazio Iacono, who understood my willing to look after a new professional challenge: a new adventure will start as of tomorrow.hashtag#team hashtag#excellence hashtag#challenges hashtag#targets hashtag#professionality
